thread.title: The Roots did the best NBA All-Star intros ever
thread.title_full: The Roots did the best NBA All-Star intros ever

author: Kristian Winfield
title: The Roots did the best NBA All-Star intros ever
text:
Brad Stevens rolled his eyes during All-Star introductions.
The Roots introduced the 2017 NBA All-Star Game rosters, and some players responded like you’d expect.
LeBron James danced as he was introduced for his 13th consecutive All-Star appearance.
All-Star Game numero 1️⃣3️⃣ #LeBronJames pic.twitter.com/tum3A3qjMU 
— Dime on UPROXX (@DimeUPROXX) February 20, 2017 Giannis Antetokounmpo made his first appearance starting as an Eastern Conference All-Star. He took a very presidential approach, waving to the crowd.
Your Milwaukee Bucks All-Star: #Giannis Antetokounmpo pic.twitter.com/6hLTjZgeHN 
— Behind the Buck Pass (@BehindTheBucks) February 20, 2017 And of course, there was Eastern Conference head coach Brad Stevens, who rolled his eyes as pre-game introductions went by.
Me when Russell Westbrook & Kevin Durant take the court together tonight #NBAAllStar pic.twitter.com/WGg4fyZ5db 
— Def Pen Hoops (@DefPenHoops) February 20, 2017
